RECORD.TEXT: 165342718 CTMC 79284819 181252 Discharge Summary Unsigned DIS Admission Date : Report Status : Unsigned HISTORY OF PRESENT ILLNESS : The patient is a 40 year old woman with end stage renal disease , on hemodialysis since 12/91 . This was secondary to polycystic kidneydisease , which was noted since age 12 . Otherwise , she has been healthy and her last hemodialysis was the day prior to transplant . PAST MEDICAL HISTORY : Significant for hypertension . PAST SURGICAL HISTORY : MEDICATIONS ON ADMIT : Iron , Nephro-Caps , calcium carbonate and Valium . She was taken to the Operating Room on 11/30/93 where Dr. Tiveloydherdes performed a cadaveric renal allograft to the left iliac fossa which she tolerated well . She was started on her immunosuppressive agents as per protocol . She was gradually advanced to a regular diet . Her prednisone was tapered to a stable dose . IA A , M.D. AX37 6066 D : 12/07/93 T :
